Commands.Steelguard: Self: Increases BRV by INT BRV × 0.75; 5 turns Steelguard (raises BRV damage resistance)Target: 5 turns Lock
Commands.Froststrike: Ice melee BRV attack + HP attackSelf: Raises BRV by 10% of HP damage dealt

Artifacts.HP Damage Guard: Raises Defense Power by 20% after taking HP damage.
Artifacts.Break BRV Up: Raises Max BRV by 5% for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Artifacts.Bravery Steelguard: Raises BRV by 10% of Initial BRV after using Steelguard.
Artifacts.Mighty Froststrike: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Froststrike by 10%.

Passives.HP Damage Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack after taking HP damage.
Passives.Steelguard Light: Slightly reduces action delay after using Steelguard.
Passives.BRV Guard Up: Slightly raises Defense when BRV is over 50%.
Passives.Steelguard BRV Gain: Gains a small amount of BRV after using Steelguard.
Passives.Froststrike Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Froststrike.
Passives.Froststrike Charge: Increases the max uses of Froststrike by 1.
Passives.Target Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack upon attacking an enemy that is targeting the user.
Passives.Indomitable Will: Prevents KO if HP is over 50% and leaves its value at 1.
Passives.Buffed Attack Boost Up: Moderately raises MAX BRV, ATK with active buffs
Passives.Steelguard Extension: Steelguard use +1When using Steelguard: • Lock applied to all enemies • Moderately increased BRV gained based on INT BRV • Slightly increased resistance to first instance of BRV damage • 10 turns BRV Regen
Passives.BRV Boost: Moderately raises MAX BRV while HP is at least 50% of MAX
Passives.Froststrike Extension: Froststrike use +2When using Froststrike: • Moderate BRV damage boost • Slightly increased BRV gained based on HP damage • Slight HP recovery based on HP damage Recovery limit: 20% of MAX HP
